attributes.action: Intervene in council decisions for 2 weekly refuse collections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 2 weekly collection of refuse is a health hazard especially in the height of summer.

We the British public pay an exorbitant amount in Council Tax and are not seeing value and return for our money.

I propose that council beaurocracy is stopped and the money spent on form filling is used to pay the wages of refuse collectors to resume weekly collections immediately
